title: S3 Ep17: Lessons from the Ebola crisis on dealing with Covid-19
itunes:title: Lessons from the Ebola crisis on dealing with Covid-19
description: The 2014 Ebola outbreak in Sierra Leone affected an area which included a pioneering experiment in community healthcare. Oeindrila Dube tells Tim Phillips about the lifesaving impact of this experiment - and two important lessons we can learn that may help to contain the spread of Covid-19 in Africa.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
